posts.title: About me
posts.text: About meHello everyone, firstly, I’m glad to introduce myself a bit.My name is Son Bui and I have worked as a web application developer for many years, I’m familiar with some languages but the best is Javascript language. I often focus on thinking programming instead of programming languages or frameworks. I love algorithms and resolve challenges.At the moment, I’m studying about the React native so I will have some posts about them after studying by myself and publish them on my blog[my blog - https://kienvietcode.tk]I have been trying to write a blog recently to share what I know and some problems or issues that I faced when coding. I hope they could be useful for someone.Thank you for your reading.
